project.teaser: TERRAVISION will establish and deploy an integrated platform to enhance the entire critical raw materials value chain towards implementing sustainable mining practices. TERRAVISION Earth Observation (EO) Mining Services Platform will be supported by 4 innovation pillars; (i)...
project.objective: TERRAVISION will establish and deploy an integrated platform to enhance the entire critical raw materials value chain towards implementing sustainable mining practices. TERRAVISION Earth Observation (EO) Mining Services Platform will be supported by 4 innovation pillars; (i) the Data Ecosystem for Large scale EO mining services will link and exploit various data from key sources (e.g. Copernicus satellite/ground radar/drone/in-situ sensing data) for monitoring the entire raw materials life cycle; (ii) the Analysis Ready Data and Raw material spectral library, will provide a novel framework for processing raw multisensory EO data to become Analysis Ready Data and to be combined semantically with in-situ data to enable the development of an open and standardised raw material spectral library to support the full mining life cycle of critical raw materials and the mapping of primary and secondary critical raw materials,(iii) the EO services for the mining industry will develop and deploy services critical to supply chain (e.g. mapping of critical raw materials, mineral exploration, extraction rates in opencast mines and stockpile volumes) but also enable a dynamic hazard mapping service for proactive management of risks to promote operational efficiency of mining sites. (iv) The Green & Resilience Accountability component will promote critical raw materials supply chain resilience and sustainability based on the quantification of environmental and socio-economic impact of mining activities for different mining phases (e.g. permission, operation, post-closure). The effectiveness of the TERRAVISION EO Mining Services Platform will be demonstrated at both EU (Greece, Spain) and beyond coupled by validation campaigns at 6 mining sites that will pave the way for rapid uptake of the proposed systemic innovations. Targeted dissemination, exploitation and replication activities will enhance a clear pathway for TERRAVISION towards significant EU-wide impact.
project.title: TERRAVISION: Integrated Earth Observation based platform for novel services to enhance raw materials mining life cycle
project.keywords: Remote sensing, Mineral exploration, Raw material extraction rate, ground deformations, Earth Observation, Copernicus, Mining services, EO mining platform

article.title: Harnessing Earth observation for a greener future

result.title: Establishment of a raw material knowledge spectral base (alpha version)
result.description: Establishment of a knowledge base for raw material (alpha version)

result.title: Mockups of the UX-UI web tool, user scenarios with feedback, metrics based on user satisfaction
result.description: A report including the user scenarios with end-user feedback and metrics based on user satisfaction will be prepared. This report will also include screenshots of UX-UI web tool mockups, so as to support the UX design of the web development tool.

result.title: Functional requirements identification and analysis
result.description: A report including the functional requirements for the TERRAVISION services, as defined by the end-users and further analysed so as to feed the system architecture.

result.title: TERRAVISION technical specifications and system architecture design
result.description: A report including the functional and non-functional requirements of the TERRAVISION system, as well as the design of a modular high-level system architecture.

result.title: Dissemination and Communication Activities, Exploitation strategy and Market uptake (initial version)
result.description: The report will present the detailed dissemination and communication plan (updated KPIs, initial list of scientific publications, initiatives for clustering activities etc.).

result.title: Use case definition and services data flows
result.description: A report including detailed definition of use cases, their needs, particularities and demonstrator scenarios and the necessary data flows for the development of TERRAVISION services, taking also into consideration the already defined end-user requirements.

result.title: State of the art of tools and methods to produce Analysis Ready Data
result.description: A report on state-of-the-art of tools and methods used to produce Analysis Ready Data.

result.title: Framework of processing Analysis Ready Data (initial design)
result.description: Initial design of a framework of Analysis Ready Data processing.

result.title: Boosting Air Quality Downscaling with Extreme-Value-Sensitive Strategies

details.authors: Maria Dekavalla; Chrysovalantis Tsiakos; Angelos Amditis; Georgios Tsimiklis

result.title: Standardization landscape and TERRAVISION contribution to standardization (initial report)
result.description: D14.3 will provide an overview to standardization landscape and the strategy for the contribution of TERRAVISION to standardization.

result.title: Development and Demonstration of RM exploration service (alpha version)
result.description: Initial version will focus on providing an overview of Raw Material Exploration Methods and Collection of Field Samples

result.title: In-situ sensors planning and installation procedures (initial version)
result.description: Initial version will focus on review of sensing instruments, site investigation and planning of in-situ sensor installation.

result.title: Development and demonstration of EO-based monitoring of stockpile volumes and extraction rates (alpha version)
result.description: Initial version that will focus on review of several SAR and gournd based methods to achieve the most accurate estimation of relative volume change.

result.title: Pixel and Feature level models (alpha version)
result.description: Alpha version of the development of pixel and feature level models for the production of Analysis Ready Data

result.title: Dynamic Hazard maps (alpha version)
result.description: Initial version of dynamic hazard maps

result.title: Primary and Secondary Raw Material maps (alpha version)
result.description: Initial version of the Primary and Secondary Raw Material maps

result.title: Surface Deformation Mapping and Monitoring (alpha version)
result.description: Development of an advanced InSAR/PSI algorithm for accommodating changes in active mine topography, optimized for execution on a cloud platform

result.title: Analysis of alignment required to link and integrate with Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem (initial version)
result.description: Initial version focusing on the analysis and the alignment required to create the link with the Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem, specifically focusing on integrating with OpenEO.

result.title: Design of the proposed super resolution architectures (initial design)
result.description: Initial design of super resolution modelling architectures

category.title: mining and mineral processing
category.displayCode: /engineering and technology/environmental engineering/mining and mineral processing

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
